column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////Food- came here to try Houston Restaurant Weeks menu and it was amazing. Now we don't take photos of our food (blah I know) because we actually chose to scarf and enjoy it...and enjoy it we did lol. Fried oysters were bomb
column2: my husband got the tuna wraps
column3: looked amazing and he loved it. Red snapper was nice and light
column4: Korean short ribs were so filling and simply delicious. The desserts
column5: omg where do I begin? Brownie + PB + Bacon is the best thing ever!!! Husband also had one of their signature whiskey cocktails and said it was legit.
